name: Immortalizing unstable beginnings
description:
Game made for the Ludum Dare 49 : Vote here !

--- To save your shots prefer using the Standalone verion. ---

Controls =

  • SPACE to take a screenshot
  • Right Click to enter camera settings (and freeze time)

The mission =

  • Your task is to observe a planet during it's earliest and most unstable stage.
  • You play as a technician controlling an O.O.T. Orbital Observation Telescope.
  • You have access to all the Spacial Telescope tools, settings and different sensors to sucess in your mission.

(Sorry that's not a bug, there is no "sucess screen" but congratulations if you completed all your missions ! )

This is only the first day of a long adventure. This game was made during the Ludum Dare 49 in 72 Hours.
